title: Virtual Reality-Based Chemical Process Safety Management Leader Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemical process theory and industrial field operation experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizes real process simulation and risk scenario experiences using smartphone-based VR equipment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the 3D structure and operating principles of chemical process equipment in VR environments with over 80% accuracy
Perform initial response procedures within 5 minutes in the event of an emergency leak incident in a virtual simulation
Evaluate crisis management decision-making capabilities at least 3 times through an abnormal process simulator

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
